title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is Martin Barnes and he is the Public Relations Chairperson for the Canadian organization Rethinking... <!--more--> AIDS.
In 2000, his girlfriend turned up HIV positive.
It was like throwing a bomb into his life.
He moved to France in 2004 and discovered Prof.
Henry Bauer’s book about AIDS and realized he was a victim of the biggest medical mistake in the history of medicine.
He worked with Christine Maggiore and the experts at Rethinking AIDS to write and publish the brochure THE AIDS TRAP illustrated by R.
Crumb which now appears in seven languages.
WEBSITE: www.TheAIDSTrap.com
